value.stringValue: Raise a ticket with this message: {!adviceType} orchestration flow. {!task.OW_task_information_name__c} task not found.
Advice method undefined. Please ask the planner to set this.
Outcome to illustrations task unknown after completing recommendations. Please raise a ticket.

choices.name: There_are_some_in_progress_already
choices.choiceText: There are some in progress already

value.stringValue: There are some in progress already

Flow.description: Orchestrates the process of trust onboarding advice.

formulas.name: deckReviewPartnerNextTask
formulas.expression: CASE({!advice.AdviceMethod__c}, "NON_PRESENTED", "Send dropbox email", "PRESENTED", "Book suitability meeting", "ERROR: UNKNOWN")

formulas.name: illustrationsTaskMessage
formulas.expression: CASE({!illustrationsTask}, "ILLUSTRATIONS_LIFELINE_TIMELINE", "illustrations, lifeline, and timeline", "ILLUSTRATIONS_LIFELINE", "illustrations and lifeline", "ILLUSTRATIONS_TIMELINE", "illustrations and timeline", "ILLUSTRATIONS_ONLY", "illustrations only", "illustrations only")

Flow.label: Advice | Trust | Onboarding | Orchestrator

fields.name: RecommendationsPrompt
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed when recommendations have been created.


Based on the advice checklist, the next task will be to do {!illustrationsTaskMessage}.

fields.name: RecommendationsCreated
fields.fieldText: Recommendations created

fields.name: recConfirm
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to update the recommendations.

fields.name: deckComp
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Please click next to submit the deck for peer review.

fields.name: meetingScreen
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to confirm that you have booked the advice meeting.

fields.name: SuitabilityMeetingDateTime
fields.fieldText: Suitability meeting date/time

fields.name: AnnualReview
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

﻿Click next to confirm that the risk call is complete. You'll then be prompted to update vulnerability & conflict of interest for all people in this household.

fields.name: CatchUpCallTookPlace
fields.fieldText: Did the catch up call take place?

fields.name: RiskCallDate
fields.fieldText: Risk/catch up call date

fields.name: RiskCallDateMessage
fields.fieldText: Risk/catch up call date is required. Get this booked with Calendly or add it using the event button below.

fields.name: VulnerabilityUpdate
fields.fieldText: Update vulnerability and conflict of interest?

fields.name: modellingcomp
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Click next to confirm that the illustrations and modelling have been completed. A task to four eye the modelling will be generated.

fields.name: Does_the_modelling_require_review
fields.fieldText: Does the modelling require review?

fields.name: updatesNeededPartnerdeck
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Please provide the outcome of the deck review.

fields.name: DeckUpdatesNeededPartner
fields.fieldText: Are updates needed?

fields.name: DeckCommentsAdded
fields.fieldText: Comments added to deck

fields.name: nonPresented
fields.fieldText: This advice has been marked as {!presentationMethod}. If this isn't correct, please add this as a comment in your review and indicate that updates are needed.

fields.name: nextTaskPartnerDeckReviewDisplay
fields.fieldText: The next task that will generate is {!deckReviewPartnerNextTask}.

fields.name: ConfirmCompleteDeckReviewPlanner
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Provide comments on the advice checklist and indicate whether this should be returned to the suitability planner.

fields.name: DeckUpdatesNeededPlanner
fields.fieldText: Are any changes needed?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ConfirmCompleteNarrativeResolvePartnerComments
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to confirm you have resolved the comments and completed the deck.

variables.description: The advice record that is being worked with.
variables.name: advice

variables.description: The checklist related to the advice.
variables.name: adviceChecklist

variables.description: The text value of the advice type developer name.
variables.name: adviceType
